utilities.sqlhandling

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.sqlhandling.Connector

  • public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds information regarding the connection to the server and functions that modify the server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONNECTING_MESSAGE 
      static java.lang.String GETTING_DRIVER_MESSAGE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connector(User user, java.lang.String host, int port)
      The constructor initialises the variables with the given values and the URL to the default one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String checkConnection()
      Checks the connection with the server by the requesting it's version and then returns it.
      void createDatabase(java.lang.String databaseName)
      Creates a new database in the server with the name that was given.
      void deleteDatabase(java.lang.String databaseName)
      Deletes a database from the server with the name that was given.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDatabases()
      Returns a the list of databases that the server contains through the use of Metadata.

      • Connector

        public Connector(User user,
                 java.lang.String host,
                 int port)
        The constructor initialises the variables with the given values and the URL to the default one.
        Parameters:
        user - the user which contains the username and password
        host - the hostname
        port - the port that will be used

      • checkConnection

        public java.lang.String checkConnection()
        Checks the connection with the server by the requesting it's version and then returns it.
        Returns:
        the version of the server if connection was established, or an empty String if it a connection could not be made

      • getDatabases

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDatabases()
        Returns a the list of databases that the server contains through the use of Metadata.
        Returns:
        a list of databases names

      • createDatabase

        public void createDatabase(java.lang.String databaseName)
        Creates a new database in the server with the name that was given.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database to create

      • deleteDatabase

        public void deleteDatabase(java.lang.String databaseName)
        Deletes a database from the server with the name that was given.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the database to delete
